entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
